name: Maze Time
description:
Maze Time is a simple 3D walking simulator.Your task in it is to look for a way out in the mazes to go to another level.
In this game you will have to wander through the mazes to find a way out.This is a simple and relaxing game that will help you pass the evening.

Key features :

1) 12 levels
2)Relaxing gameplay
3)pleasant soundtrack
